tool_description: Analyzes vehicle telemetry and maintenance history to predict upcoming maintenance needs and failure risks.

analysis_period_days.description: Number of days ahead to predict maintenance needs

include_historical_data.description: Whether to include historical maintenance patterns in analysis

error_messages: Vehicle not found: The provided vehicle_id does not exist in the fleet database.
Insufficient data: Vehicle has insufficient telemetry or maintenance history for reliable analysis.
Invalid analysis period: analysis_period_days must be between 1 and 365.
usage: Provide vehicle_id and optionally set analysis_period_days and include_historical_data. The tool returns predicted maintenance needs and risk assessments.

predicted_maintenance_items.description: List of maintenance tasks predicted to be needed

risk_scores.description: Risk scores (0-100) corresponding to each predicted maintenance item

estimated_dates.description: Estimated dates when maintenance will be needed
